sentences.en: Boys in the village have probably been shooting vermin.
sentences.cn: 村里的男孩子可能一直在射杀害鸟.

sentences.en: Call upon your vermin to your back, sir, and fall on!
sentences.cn: 先生, 赶快去召集你的那帮坏蛋,帮助你发动攻击吧!
农夫把狐狸看成是祸害.

sentences.en: Foxes were traditionally regarded as vermin.
sentences.cn: 人们传统上都认为狐狸是有害的动物.

sentences.en: From 1066 to the 17th century the fox was looked upon as vermin.
sentences.cn: 从1066年到17世纪，狐狸一直被视为害兽。

sentences.en: I will kill you soon, you and all your vermin.
sentences.cn: 我马上就要杀了你, 还有你的那些手下.

sentences.en: In Scotland, wild cats are treated as vermin and poisoned.
sentences.cn: 在苏格兰野猫被视为有害动物而遭毒杀.

sentences.en: Is there adequate protection ( screening ) against birds, animals, and vermin?
sentences.cn: 是否有足够的保护措施来防止鸟, 鼠和虫等?

sentences.en: No form of construction likely to harbour vermin should be used.
sentences.cn: 不得使用容易隐藏害虫的构造方式.

sentences.en: On farms the fox is considered vermin and treated as such.
sentences.cn: 在农场里狐狸被当成有害动物来对待。

sentences.en: Some communicable diseases are transmitted only through the agency of vermin or insects.
sentences.cn: 某些传染病只通过害虫和昆虫来传播.

sentences.en: That the Russians loathed and despised the Germans as a form of invading vermin was obvious.
sentences.cn: 德国人那种作为入侵歹徒的形象受到俄国人的深痛恶绝和唾弃自不待言.

sentences.en: The beds were filthy and full of vermin.
sentences.cn: 那些床铺肮脏不堪，而且爬满了虫子。

sentences.en: Vermin don't have to exterminate themselves.
sentences.cn: 虫豸是用不着自己杀害自己的.

sentences.en: You want me to stop treating you like the vermin you are?
sentences.cn: 你不想让我把你当作个害人精来对待 吗 ?

words.tran_cn: 由害虫引起的；害虫的；卑鄙的；肮脏的

trans.tran_cn: 害兽及害鸟，害虫，危害社会或他人的人，歹徒
trans.tran_en: small animals, birds, and insects that are harmful because they destroy crops, spoil food, and spread disease
